title: Was the "Skins I Own" taken away, how long ago?
body: Must have missed something...or many things. I was trying to see what skins I own because I got some free ones during the sale and I forget which champs they were for. I know I can go into each champ and look. It would be nice to have like an inventory list.

replies.body: Purchased history is probably the best way you can take a look at. Scrolling through all the champions just to check the skin is a pain in the ass hahah

Like Exalted Lucina said, you can go in your Purchases > Gifting History to see what you've received/bought, but the layout is kind of shitty and not always in order, and it only saves data for the last 3 months (pretty sure it's 3). If you want to see what they were but can't find it there, I'd suggest submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can pull that information.

Otherwise, I agree that the client needs something more like this.
If you go to purchases you can see a list of items you have purchased from the store.
